row.process:
:P "Beginn Upgrade of &DEPLPKG# on &TARGET_AGENT# with Parameters &PARAMETERS#" ! Bestimmung aus GUI was installiert werden soll, Achtung auf Stringl채ngen und Positionen :DEFINE &COLPOS#, unsigned :DEFINE &DPOS#, unsigned :SET &COLPOS# = STR_FIND_REVERSE(&DEPLPKG#,":") :SET &COLPOS# = &COLPOS# + 1 :SET &DPOS# = STR_FIND_REVERSE(&DEPLPKG#,"-") :SET &DPOS# = &DPOS# + 1 :SET &VLEN# = &COLPOS# - &DPOS# - 1 :SET &NLEN# = &DPOS# -2 :PSET &PKGTYPE# = SUBSTR(&DEPLPKG#, &COLPOS#) :PSET &PKGVERSION# = SUBSTR(&DEPLPKG#, &DPOS#,&VLEN# ) :PSET &PKGNAME# = SUBSTR(&DEPLPKG#, 1, &NLEN# ) :P "Package Name: &PKGNAME#, Package Version: &PKGVERSION#, Package Type: &PKGTYPE#"
:P "Search Packets on &TARGET_AGENT#" ! Bestimmung der auf dem Zielagenten installierten Paketen 체ber VARA -> SQL in uc4dep-Schema auf AE-DB :PSET &SEARCH_TOKEN# = &TARGET_AGENT# :PSET &FOUND_PKG# = "NO" :SET &HND# = PREP_PROCESS_VAR(SW_DEPL.VA.PKG_UNINSTALLABLE) :PROCESS &HND# : SET &INST_PKG# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#,1) : P Found &INST_PKG# : SET &CHECK# = STR_STARTS_WITH(&INST_PKG#,&PKGNAME#) : IF &CHECK# EQ "Y" : PSET &FOUND_PKG# = &INST_PKG# : P &PKGNAME# found on &TARGET_AGENT# : ENDIF :ENDPROCESS :P End of Search on &TARGET_AGENT#
! Die Script-Variablen &SKIP_INSTALL# und &SKIP_UNINSTALL# werden im Jobplan als Pre-Condition zur Ausf체hrung/Skippen benutzt :IF &FOUND_PKG# EQ "NO" : P "&PKGNAME# not found on &TARGET_AGENT# - Skipping Uninstallation" : PSET &SKIP_UNINSTALL# = "Y" : PSET &SKIP_INSTALL# = "N" :ELSE ! Paket gefunden, Version bestimmen, Achtung auf Positionen und Stringl채ngen : SET &COLPOS# = STR_FIND_REVERSE(&FOUND_PKG#,":") : PSET &DEL_PKG# = SUBSTR(&FOUND_PKG#,1,&COLPOS#) : SET &DPOS# = STR_FIND_REVERSE(&DEL_PKG#,"-") : SET &DPOS# = &DPOS# + 1 : SET &VLEN# = &COLPOS# - &DPOS# : SET &INST_VER# = SUBSTR(&FOUND_PKG#,&DPOS#,&VLEN#) : IF &INST_VER# EQ &PKGVERSION# : PSET &SKIP_UNINSTALL# = "Y" : PSET &SKIP_INSTALL# = "Y" : P "&PKGNAME# already installed in Version &PKGVERSION# on &TARGET_AGENT#" : P "Skipping further actions." : ELSE ! Paket in einer anderen Version gefunden -> ersetzen (auch Downgrade!) : PSET &SKIP_UNINSTALL# = "N" : PSET &SKIP_INSTALL# = "N" : PSET &DEL_PKG# = &DEL_PKG#&PKGTYPE# : P "Uninstalling &DEL_PKG# from &TARGET_AGENT#" : ENDIF :ENDIF
